content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava—I'm here to help you schedule your electrical service. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Mike! Could you please provide your address so we can confirm you’re within our service area?
It’s 124 Maple Avenue, I think that’s all you need?
Great, thank you! Could you tell me when you’d like our electrician to come by? What’s your ideal date and time?
Um, probably tomorrow after lunch? Is that, like, 2pm or 3pm okay?
Thank you for sharing your preferred time, Mike! Let me check our calendar real quick for availability at 2pm or 3pm tomorrow.
Sorry, I’m having trouble accessing our calendar right now. I’m going to get one of our team members to help you finish your booking!
reason: Agent unable to check calendar due to system error.

content: Hi Mike, this is Sarah from XYZ. Sorry for the hiccup! I can help you finish your booking. Just to confirm, you’re looking for someone tomorrow at 2pm or 3pm for electrical work at 124 Maple Avenue. Is that correct?
Yeah, that’s right. 2pm is probably better.

Perfect, Mike! I’ve scheduled you for 2pm tomorrow at 124 Maple Avenue. You’ll receive a reminder the day of your appointment. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you for choosing XYZ Home Services!
